title: createPlayer
description: Creates a player in a server.
examples:
```js
createPlayer({ guildId: <PRIu64 or String>, voiceChannelId: <PRIu64 or String> })
```

```js
const player = Lavalink.createPlayer({ guildId: message.guild.id, voiceChannelId: message.member.voice.channel.id }) // Discord.js

const player = Lavalink.createPlayer({ guildId: message.guildID, voiceChannelId: message.member.voiceState.channelID }) // Eris
```
observations: You will need this function for use the [connect](https://github.com/ThePedroo/FastLink/tree/main/docs/connect.md), [getQueue](https://github.com/ThePedroo/FastLink/tree/main/docs/getQueue.md), [play](https://github.com/ThePedroo/FastLink/tree/main/docs/play.md), [search](https://github.com/ThePedroo/FastLink/tree/main/docs/search.md), [stop](https://github.com/ThePedroo/FastLink/tree/main/docs/stop.md), [destroy](https://github.com/ThePedroo/FastLink/tree/main/docs/destroy.md), [setVolume](https://github.com/ThePedroo/FastLink/tree/main/docs/setVolume.md) and [setPaused](https://github.com/ThePedroo/FastLink/tree/main/docs/setPaused.md) functions. They are necessary for the bot to play a music.
